newsletter.subscribed: You have successfully subscribed to Apillon platform news.

terms.project: I understand that the Apillon Closed Beta delivers no guarantees related to functionalities or access and is intended for testing purposes only. Beta features also come with several limitations, which will be removed with each platform update as more and more users deliver feedback on Closed Beta and help improve the platform's services.
terms.payment: I understand the billing process and some other legal stuff.

domain.editDisabled: Website domain can be changed every 15 minutes.

review.confirm: Proceed with Website Deployment, I'll wait
content: Deployments of websites on the Free Plan undergo security checks to prevent phishing attempts and other malicious activities. While we typically review websites promptly, please note that it may take up to 24 hours. Once approved, your website will be accessible through our IPFS gateway.
Consider upgrading to one of our paid plans for immediate deployment without the security check delay.
review.title: Free Plan Website Review by Apillon

burn.title: Burn token

created.info:
To display your NFTs and mint them, you need a website. 
Use the Apillon NFT website template and host it on a decentralized network.
created.or: or see its contents in your
created.title: Display your NFTs on the internet

labelInfo.collectionBaseUri: Paste the collection metadata base URI here.
labelInfo.collectionChain: Select the network where your NFTs will be deployed
labelInfo.collectionDropStart: A date when your NFT collection becomes publicly available for visitors to buy NFTs.
labelInfo.collectionDrop: With drop, your collection becomes accessible for visitors to buy NFTs from a certain date onwards.
labelInfo.collectionMaxSupply: The specified number serves as a max supply. Once set, you won't be able to add more files than specified to the collection.
labelInfo.collectionName: The name you choose will be the official name of your NFT collection, “name” NFT collection.
labelInfo.collectionDropReserve: A number of NFT you wish to reserve for yourself before the drop.
labelInfo.collectionRevocable: Collection owner can destroy NFT(s) at any point in time.
labelInfo.collectionRoyaltiesAddress: It’s the address to receive optional royalties in case NFT gets sold further.
labelInfo.collectionRoyaltiesFees: The % value of royalties you want to collect in the future NFT sales.
labelInfo.collectionSoulbound: Soulbound NFTs are not tradeable, they cannot leave the wallet they were deposited into.
labelInfo.collectionSupplyLimited: If limited, please specify the actual number of the NFTs in total supply on the right.
labelInfo.collectionSymbol: A symbol acts as a token name on the blockchain for this NFT collection. It consists of 3 or 4 letters, in connection to the name of the NFT collection.
labelInfo.collectionUseGateway: Collection base uri points to IPFS. If this checkbox is checked, base uri will point to CID on Apillon private gateway, which provide better performance. Otherwise base uri points to: ipfs://[CID], and gateway need to be handled manually.

bucket.new: Each file hosting that passes through Crust's pinning and replication service is paid up front for a minimum period of 6 months. Apillon has no control over amending that period, so keep in mind that all files you deploy to Apillon storage buckets will remain accessible for that period of time.
bucket.delete: All items stored in this bucket will be permanently deleted after 3 months. Until then you can find them in the deleted items tab and you can restore them anytime before.

file.delete: This item will be permanently deleted after 3 months. Until then you can find them in the deleted items tab and you can restore them anytime before.

folder.delete: All items stored in this folder will be permanently deleted after 3 months. Until then you can find them in the deleted items tab and you can restore them anytime before.

hosting.upload: With web3 hosting you can only hosting static, client site rendered pages. Server side rendering is not supported.
hosting.deploy: Please be advised that the deployment may take up to 5 minutes to complete.

nft.new: Your NFT collection is now configured. If you proceed with this step, the deployment of NFT collection on blockchain will start. Once deployed, the NFTs will be live on the blockchain and ready to mingle with the world.
